content: on page 1 if you re ​ subscribe & watch the podcast confused join our ravelry group repeat rounds 1 & 2 -- 83 more times each ​ ​ share your projects on ravelry or instagram ​ for a total of 166 more rounds using then work round 1 once more ​ #kodiakcowl #thebluemouseknits bind off setup round cb *k1 brp1 for pattern support email emily at ​ ​ ​ repeat from * to end bluemouseshop@gmail com bind off i suggest a simple knit bind off ​ thank you for supporting my design but you want to do this really loosely so your project has room to stretch when you block it i suggest using a needle 1 or 2 sizes larger like a us 8 5 0 mm to bind off you donʼt have to transfer the stitches to it instead use the larger needle to knit off the stitches to bind off more free patterns craggy shore socks | ivy cardigan | glen echo baby blanket | sea oats socks ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ popular paid for patterns lofoten sweater | thun sweater | worsted lofoten | vale beanie | skorda cowl ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ 2019 copyright ©the blue mouse | emily franck kodiak cowl | @thebluemouse_
